sourceData.name: sourceData
sourceData.description: If HTML should be read from binary or JSON data
sourceData.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

dataPropertyName.name: dataPropertyName
dataPropertyName.description: Name of the JSON property in which the HTML to extract the data from can be found. The property can either contain a string or an array of strings.
dataPropertyName.ai_hint: Name of the JSON property in which the HTML to extract the data from can be found. The property can either contain a string or an array of strings.

extractionValues.name: extractionValues

values.name: key
values.description: The key under which the extracted value should be saved

values.name: returnValue

options.name: Attribute
options.description: Get an attribute value like "class" from an element

options.name: HTML
options.description: Get the HTML the element contains

options.name: Text
options.description: Get only the text content of the element

options.name: Value
options.description: Get value of an input, select or textarea

values.description: What kind of data should be returned

values.name: attribute
values.description: The name of the attribute to return the value off

values.name: returnArray
values.description: Whether to return the values as an array so if multiple ones get found they also get returned separately. If not set all will be returned as a single string.

extractionValues.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

options.name: options
trimValues
options.description: Whether to remove automatically all spaces and newlines from the beginning and end of the values

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。
